game.name: Maximum Power
game.description:
This game is your ultimate effort to judge the strength and power that you have in waging war against the demonic enemies, who, have captured your friends and foes in an action fighting game, Maximum Power. In one of the best action games online, you play the character either of Joey and Zaro who are friends and are on a deadly mission to take on the evil force of Greenos.

As in most nerve wrecking free action games online, the girlfriend of Zaro has been kidnapped by Zaro and now both of them are headed towards the region of Greenos. As a player in this most challenging online action game to search Jessica you will be attacked by deadly monsters and demons. To emerge as a winner you will have to fight with the monster with all the action skills to accomplish your mission successfully.

During the levels of the game, there are total eight master robots that are required to be killed in order to be victorious from Greenos army. While registering protest to enemy armies keep on collection diamond that you will need to further upgrade the weapons and skills. With extending games level the number of enemies too will also increase and killing them too become very difficult as tiresome too.

Game control is provided by the keys. Up arrow key is for moving forwards and the down keys there is for moving the backward. S key helps to attack the enemies. Press the D key to jump and the W key to launch a special attack. Use the spacebar to shop for upgrades.
